title: Sans used by Starbucks in the summer of 2007
content:
Closest I've come is [Black Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017022545/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/blackgroteskatt/), stretched. It's close, but not quite there. The font blurb mentions that Black Grotesk is based on Gasetny Chorny (Ossip Lehmann foundry) and Kompakte Grotesk (Haas).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017022545im_/http:/typophile.com/files/starbucks2007_5361.JPG)
author: tupper
